video_games.name: Shadow's Edge
video_games.description: A dark fantasy RPG where you control a rogue assassin navigating a war-torn kingdom, facing treacherous enemies and tough moral choices.

video_games.name: Galactic Odyssey
video_games.description: A space exploration adventure game where players traverse distant planets, uncover hidden civilizations, and battle intergalactic foes.

video_games.name: Battlezone Royale
video_games.description: A fast-paced battle royale game set in a futuristic arena, where players fight for survival using advanced weapons and strategic tactics.

video_games.name: Mystic Forest
video_games.description: An enchanting puzzle-platformer where you solve ancient riddles in a magical forest, uncovering secrets of lost civilizations.

video_games.name: Warrior's Legacy
video_games.description: A multiplayer medieval combat game that combines strategic warfare with intense swordplay, set in a kingdom on the brink of collapse.

video_games.name: Neon Racer X
video_games.description: A high-speed futuristic racing game featuring neon-lit streets, gravity-defying vehicles, and adrenaline-pumping tracks.
